name: Sprint 2 - Vintage UI Restoration
goal: Fully investigate, plan, and implement vintage UI design fixes to restore the extension's professional vintage aesthetic

items.title: Investigate and Fix UI Design Implementation for Vintage Theme
items.description: A consistent and fully functional vintage UI design across the extension for a professional and aesthetically pleasing experience while using the LinkedIn automation features
acceptanceCriteria: All UI components display with proper vintage typography and styling using Crimson Text font family
CSS loads correctly on all LinkedIn pages without 404 errors or loading failures
Vintage theme colors (vintage-ink, vintage-sepia, vintage-sage, vintage-accent) are consistent across all views
Font families (Crimson Text with fallbacks to Georgia, Times New Roman) render properly across all browsers
UI elements maintain responsive design on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
No visual glitches, styling conflicts, or unstyled elements appear in any part of the extension
Popup interface displays with complete vintage theme styling and typography
Dashboard view maintains vintage design consistency with proper paper-like backgrounds
Content scripts inject vintage styles correctly without conflicts with LinkedIn's existing CSS
All vintage CSS classes (.vintage-text, .vintage-headline, .vintage-body, etc.) function as intended
Vintage toggle switches, buttons, and form elements display correctly with vintage styling
Modal overlays and connection interfaces maintain vintage theme consistency
Print styles work correctly for true newspaper feel when printing extension content
Accessibility features work properly with high contrast and reduced motion preferences

items.title: Investigate and Test Vintage UI Implementation Issues
items.description: Investigate current UI rendering issues, identify root causes of vintage theme not displaying correctly, and create comprehensive tests to verify all UI components

items.title: Plan and Implement Vintage UI Design Fixes
items.description: Based on investigation findings, plan and implement comprehensive fixes to restore the full vintage UI design across all extension components

agenda: Define success metrics and acceptance criteria

sprintObjectives: Restore complete vintage UI design functionality across all extension components
Achieve 100% CSS loading success rate without 404 errors
Implement responsive vintage design that works across all devices and browsers
Establish maintainable CSS architecture for future theme development
Ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA) with vintage design

riskAssessment.risk: CSS conflicts with LinkedIn's native styles
riskAssessment.mitigation: Implement CSS-in-JS with proper scoping and specificity management
Use font-display: swap and implement progressive enhancement
Implement comprehensive cross-browser testing and CSS normalization

dependencies.description: CSS loading infrastructure must be working properly
